description.narrative: - Further Development of ICT Sector in Sub-Saharan Africa: Based on substantial expertise in ICT sectors and hands-on, value added approach to investees, the Fund Manager will continue to proactively source investment opportunities with significant socio-economic and developmental impact. - Provision of Critical Funding and Expertise to Emerging Market Companies: The Fund will address critical funding needs by emerging market companies that due to their business stage or scale might face capital access constraints. The Fund''s investments will support entrepreneurship, innovative business models and technologies, and generate employment. The Fund Manager will provide operational, technical and managerial advice to its investees. - Development of Africa Private Equity Sector: The importance of private equity for development of emerging market private sector, nurturing entrepreneurship and supporting business innovation is well recognized, and IFC''s commitment to the Fund will serve as a vote of confidence for Africa''s growing private equity industry.

The Project consists of an IFCs equity commitment of up to US$45 million in Convergence Partners Communications Infrastructure Fund LLC, an up to US$500 million investment vehicle, which is being raised and will be managed by Convergence Partners Management Limited (Convergence Partners), a South Africa based investment management firm. The Funds strategy is to invest in the opportunities presented by current underdeveloped state of Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) infrastructure in Africa. In IFCs experience, funding is often not the only requirement for successful ICT infrastructure investments. Other critical components include project conceptualization, design, development and implementation. Over the past few years, Convergence Partners have demonstrated the capacity, knowledge and skills, as well as proven investment track that position the firm to successfully capitalize on the opportunities in Africa ICT infrastructure sector.
